channel.title: Maybe a Good update for Rs
channel.description:
Why wont runescape mkae their server like wow or shadowbane and flyff
1. Make the Client Downloadbale ( Has Cheat protection ) 2. Good Gfx like wow and shadowbane 3. Bigger worlds and nicer update's also patch updates
how about that?
possable?

item.title: Maybe a Good update for Rs
item.dc:creator: @Click_Here Click Here
item.description:
@Click_Here wrote:

WoW sucks ass from a straw.

Read full topic
item.source: Maybe a Good update for Rs

item.title: Maybe a Good update for Rs
item.dc:creator: @god_of_ikiliki god of ikiliki
item.description:
@god_of_ikiliki wrote:

[quote=“eVokki`, post:8, topic:164607”][quote author=God of Ikiliki link=topic=223469.msg1929900#msg1929900 date=1197635492]
Runescape is special because it’s pretty nice for a non-downloadable game.
WoW sucks, if you like it go play it.
RS will not become like WoW.
[/quote]

I find it funny how most people say " Oh WoW Sucks " When half of them haven’t played it before, or they don’t like it because of the price. None the less, WoW Is still superior to Runescape, vaster words, better economy, better graphics, better gameplay.[/quote]
I played it twice, I don’t care about the price, if I want to play it my mother would pay for it.

[quote=“xdarklight.x, post:7, topic:164607”][quote author=God of Ikiliki link=topic=223469.msg1929900#msg1929900 date=1197635492]
Runescape is special because it’s pretty nice for a non-downloadable game.
WoW sucks, if you like it go play it.
RS will not become like WoW.
[/quote]

im not really saying for it to become like wow but make it a downloadable game with patch updates[/quote]Many people play it because you don’t have to download something, that’s what Jagex says also.
It’s good for just non-downloadable game.
If you go change it to gfx like Wow, make it downloadable and such it would suck alot.
Even I couldn’t play on school anymore because it would take a long time to DL every time.

Read full topic
item.source: Maybe a Good update for Rs

item.title: Maybe a Good update for Rs
item.dc:creator: @Dizzy Dizzy
item.description:
@Dizzy wrote:

If RS had the same graphics as Shadowbane, I’d probably quit. So far, how the RS characters are animated, it would go much better if the graphics were more like WoW (sorta like a cartoon).

Read full topic
